description.en-us: BIGTREETECH Kraken V1.0 is a 32-bit motherboard for large printers. It comes with onboard high-voltage, high-current stepper motor drivers, significantly simplifying the connection between the motherboard and high-voltage drivers and saving space in the chassis.
description.zh-cn: BIGTREETECH Kraken V1.0是一款专为大型打印机设计的主板，采用32位架构。其内置高压大电流步进电机驱动器，大幅简化了主板与高压驱动器的连接流程，同时有效节省走线空间。
